MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting properties in Manor Street and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 5:25PM. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to complete repairs to an underground cable fault on Manor Street affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:46PM on 08 April 2021.
